title: Remove in-app software update / update-available banner UI

requirements.summary: Ensure the in-app “Software update” / “Update Available” banner is never displayed in any app state, without changing any other UI or behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: No update-related pop-up/banner is displayed on any screen/state of the app (unauthenticated, authenticated, profile setup, or connection error states).
All other app behavior remains unchanged (login, quiz flows, diagnostics, etc.).
The frontend builds successfully with no unused-import or lint/type errors related to PendingUpdateBanner.

file_operations.description: Remove PendingUpdateBanner import and remove its rendering from all App entry states (unauthenticated view, actor initialization error view, profile setup view, main authenticated view) while leaving all other logic/UI untouched.
Disable the update banner UI so it never renders (e.g., return null) and remove any now-unused imports/logic inside the component to prevent lint/type errors, without changing any other app flows.
